Dataset Name: Cardiac Assessment and Classification of Ultrasound (CACTUS)
Source: Concordia Institute for Information Systems Engineering,
Notes: A comprehensive collection of 37,736 graded cardiac ultrasound images from scans of a CAE Blue Phantom, covering different heart views and quality levels (A4C, SC, PL, PSAV, PSMV, Random). Images are classified and graded on a scale from 0 to 10 based on completeness and clarity. Used to develop an AI framework for classifying and grading cardiac ultrasound images.

A large, publicly accessible ultrasound challenge database comprising 1,833 distinct ultrasound data from 13 different ultrasound image anomalies. Derived from publicly available data on the Internet.
A pre clinical ultrasound dataset of rat organs (brain brain tumor kidney) with an ultrafast device.
A pre clinical ultrasound dataset of rat brain with an ultrafast device including RF data.
A pre clinical ultrasound dataset of transcranial awake mice brain with an ultrafast device including 4D data.
